20110118192719.000|20110118192720.000|CC1|AREA WHERE THEY THINK THE       
20110118192720.000|20110118192722.000|CC1|SUSPECT IS, THE STUDENTS        
20110118192722.000|20110118192724.000|CC1|WEARING DARK CLOTHING.          
20110118192724.000|20110118192726.000|CC1|THEY WILL HAVE THAT             
20110118192726.000|20110118192726.000|CC1|INFORMATION WITH THE            
20110118192726.000|20110118192727.000|CC1|S.W.A.T. TEAM.

20110118192730.000|20110118192731.000|CC1|THEY WILL HAVE THAT IN          
20110118192731.000|20110118192733.000|CC1|CONJUNCTION WITH THE K-9        
20110118192733.000|20110118192734.000|CC1|SEARCH.                         
20110118192734.000|20110118192734.000|CC1|THEY WANT TO MAKE SURE THAT

20110118192740.000|20110118192741.000|CC1|S.W.A.T. TEAM.                  
20110118192741.000|20110118192742.000|CC1|SIBILA: ALSO WE WANT TO MAKE    
20110118192742.000|20110118192742.000|CC1|A CLARIFICATION.                
20110118192742.000|20110118192745.000|CC1|WE DO NOT KNOW WHO WAS SHOT.

20110118192749.000|20110118192750.000|CC1|PEOPLE THAT WERE SHOT AND
